Back To Recipes

recipe

Ingredients

4 Yellow Onions 4 units and wash
8 Garlic Cloves 8 units
Chipotle Pepper In Adobo Sauce 7½ ounces
Olive Oil 8 Tbsp
Lime 8 Tbsp
Dried Oregano 4 tsp
Cumin 2 tsp
Black Pepper 4 dashs
Salt 4 dashs
Chicken Breast Package 4 pounds

Nutrition

955 calories (Yellow Onion/Garlic ...Data Missing)

2 sodium (Yellow Onion/Garlic ...Data Missing)

0 sugar (Yellow Onion/Garlic ...Data Missing)

0 fiber (Yellow Onion/Garlic ...Data Missing)

0 protein (Yellow Onion/Garlic ...Data Missing)

0 total_cost (Yellow Onion/Garlic ...Data Missing)

Recipe

Estimated Time: 120 Minutes

Chop 4 Yellow Onions and add to blender
Chop 8 Garlic Cloves and add to blender
Add 7½ ounces Chipotle Pepper In Adobo Sauce to blender
Add 8 Tbsp Olive Oil to blender
Add 8 Tbsp Lime to blender
Add 4 tsp Dried Oregano to blender
Add 2 tsp Cumin to blender
Add 4 dashs Black Pepper to blender
Add 4 dashs Salt to blender
Blend ingredients
Cube 4 pounds Chicken Breast Package
Put Chicken Breast Package and the marinade in a bowl and cover with tin foil
Timer 2 hours Let meat sit in marinade for at least 2 hours
